name: NEVER SURRENDER
description:
NEVER SURRENDER is a simple, but hard to master retro-style shooter with a lot of opponents.

Story: There was a epic battle in space. You are the last survivor of your fraction. So the fate is clear: you will die. But until then you will NEVER SURRENDER!

Mission: Try to kill as many oppenents as possible.

Will you die as a hero?

NEVER SURRENDER is for free. But if you like it, then feel free to donate a small amount.
